item.title: Containerizing TIBCO BusinessWorks 5
item.description: Preparation To prepare the container build, I downloaded the current versions of TRA/BW/EMS from the TIBCO edelivery platform. I downloaded the following artifacts: TIB_TRA_5.11.0_linux_x86_64.zip TIB_BW_5.14.0_linux26gl23_x86_64.zip TIB_rv_8.4.6_linux_x86.zip TIB_ems_8.5.1_linux_x86_64.zip Now to bring those together into a container I copied all of those into a tibco-businessworks-runtime directory. Installation To support a headless installation, the TIBCO universal installer uses silent files. I attached my silent file at the end of this post.
